problems.title: Sum of Digits Until Single Digit
problems.description:
You are given a positive integer N. Repeatedly replace N by the sum of its digits until N becomes a single-digit number. Your task is to output this final single-digit value.

Input Format:
A single integer N.

Output Format:
Print a single integer, the final single-digit value.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
9875

Sample Output
2

Explanation:
9+8+7+5 = 29, then 2+9 = 11, then 1+1 = 2.
hintsList: You can repeatedly take sum of digits using n % 10 and n / 10 until n < 10. There is also a digital root formula using modulo 9.
